synopsis.text:
In the futuristic landscape of the year 2100, Amami Kurau, the 12-year-old daughter of a pioneering scientist, finds herself entangled in a world of extraordinary powers and relentless pursuits. As her father spearheads a groundbreaking energy research project on the colonized moon, Kurau's life takes a dramatic turn when she accompanies him to the lab on her birthday. A catastrophic mishap ensues, causing Kurau to be engulfed by a mysterious light energy, transforming her into a vessel for the enigmatic Rynax.

The Rynax, a binary alien entity, bestows Kurau with formidable superhuman abilities and a second consciousness. As Kurau grapples with her newfound powers and shared identity, she and her father become estranged, with Kurau using her unique gifts to make a living as a fearsome bounty hunter.

However, the corporation behind the original experiment remains undeterred in their pursuit of the Rynax's energy. As Kurau's existence becomes increasingly known, the Government Police Organization (GPO) sets its sights on capturing her and harnessing her abilities. Now, Kurau must safeguard herself and her Rynax 'pair,' Christmas, who is more cherished to her than life itself. Can Kurau and Christmas find the tranquility they yearn for, or will they forever be the ultimate targets in a world of ruthless agents?
